payload.message:
Run a Slack check-in summary using only the latest inbox + calendar signals.

Use these exact commands (in order):
1) gog gmail search --json --plain --max 50 "is:unread in:inbox newer_than:1d"
2) gog gmail search --json --plain --max 50 "is:unread in:inbox is:important older_than:2d"
3) gog calendar events --all --today --json
4) gog calendar events --all --days 1 --from=now --json

Then send a Slack-ready summary in plain text with these sections and bullet points:
- What I need to do today
- Important emails I forgot to act on
- Upcoming calendar events
- Suggested priorities

Use short, actionable items only. If any section is empty, say "None". Keep it concise and skip noise. Prioritize items that are urgent or have deadlines.

jobs.name: Remind call Ghazi recurring
jobs.description: Remind every 10min to call Ghazi until user replies ACK
